Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Outline the process as described including ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck with loop to RequestMoreInfo SkillAssessment CulturalFitCheck or CommunityAffiliationCheck ManagerialReview FinalDecision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For the first model after the skill assessment there is an XOR choice one branch to standard CulturalFitCheck and the other to CommunityAffiliationCheck that gives unfair advantage

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For the second model no XOR branch all applicants undergo the same CulturalFitCheck after skill assessment

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Translate into POWL models using activities XOR for choice LOOP for data completeness and StrictPartialOrder for sequencing

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Adjust structure for loop between DataCompletenessCheck and RequestMoreInfo as OperatorPOWL LOOP children B and C

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For first model partial order with A loop D XOR E F G H where XOR is OperatorPOWL with children CulturalFitCheck and CommunityAffiliationCheck followed by ManagerialReview and FinalDecision

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For second model partial order with A loop D E G H ensuring sequence without branching after SkillAssessment
